content: this pattern is free on my blog or you can purchase the pdf here i whipped up a set of these bowls in just an evening in three sizes that nest together they ve got flat bottoms so they don t tip over and made with super chunky yarn they re very nearly instant gratification simple stitches with textured sides to keep them interesting they make a great gift are a fun way to organize all that clutter and add a pop of color wherever they go video tutorial included
